Content:
I keep tuning my mirrors because in different scenarios in same ride, I feel mirrors need to be different lol. Any guidance on what references do I need to take in order for mirrors to have less blind spot as possible?
What references do you take while tuning the position of mirrors in your 2 wheeler vehicle?

Title: What references do you take to tune your scooter's mirrors?
